data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will persistently bring generally fine weather to Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to start affecting southern China gradually on next Tuesday. Winds will strengthen over the region and temperatures will fall appreciably afterwards. The weather over the coast of Guangdong will become cold in the middle and latter parts of next week. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will linger over the seas east of the Philippines in the next few days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260117","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
